dict.acceptation: 规则，规定；统治，支配；章程；
控制，支配；判定；裁定，裁决；价格稳定；

sent.orig: CBR (Case-Based Reasoning)is one of the most distinguishing methods different from RBR(Rule-Based Reasoulng)in AI.
sent.trans: CBR(Case-BasedReasoning)以完全不同于RBR(Rule—BasedReasoning)的方式在人工智能的众多技术中独树一帜。

sent.orig: The Macro-Theory in English textual teaching includes three rules: omitting rule, generalizing rule and structuring rule.
sent.trans: 英语语篇教学中的宏观理论有三个规则，即删略规则，概括规则和结构规则。

sent.orig: Chinese iconicity embodies time-order rule and whole-part rule in syntax, semantic and pragmatics.
sent.trans: 汉语的临摹在句法、语义和语用三个方面都体现出时间顺序原则和整体部分原则。

sent.orig: Surplus value rule is the basic rule of market economy.
sent.trans: 剩余价值规律是市场经济的基本规律。

sent.orig: In the past year, RIF Rule Commission has been trying to discuss the new opening rule.
sent.trans: 这段时间国际连珠联盟规则委员会一直致力于对连珠新规则的讨论。
